constexpr /*inner-iterator*/&amp; operator++();

{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|
constexpr void operator++( int );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Increments the {{rlp|/|iterator}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}.

@1@ Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
++*parent_-&gt;current_;
if (*parent_-&gt;current_ == ranges::end(parent_-&gt;base_))
    parent_-&gt;remainder_ = 0;
else
    --parent_-&gt;remainder_;
return *this;
}}
&lt;!----&gt;
Before invocation of this operator the expression {{c|1=*this == std::default_sentinel}} must be {{c/core|false}}.

@2@ Equivalent to {{c|++*this}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ {{c|*this}}
@2@ (none)
